product_name: Mountain Hardwear Callisto Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Highly breathable and wind-resistant, the women's lightweight Mountain Hardwear Callisto Jacket is a great choice for any activity. Throw it in your pack for quick and easy warmth and comfort. Deflection(TM) soft-shell fabric is densely knit for high durability and softness; it also has stretch for comfortable mobility. Internal brushed microfleece backer wicks moisture away from you and adds a bit of warmth for increased comfort. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined chin guard eliminates zipper chafing; inner buttery-soft microfleece cuffs seal in warmth. The women's Mountain Hardwear Callisto Jacket features zip handwarmer pockets and an internal zip stash pocket. Drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: Highly breathable and wind-resistant, the women's lightweight Mountain Hardwear Callisto Jacket is a great choice for any activity. Throw it in your pack for quick and easy warmth and comfort.
